rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Vastu compliant north-facing entrance with a welcoming reception area. Includes space for storage and shoe rack.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area adjoining the kitchen, with natural lighting and ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, facilitating family meals; maintains open plan aesthetic.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Mediterranean kitchen with integrated appliances and storage. Open-plan integration with dining area.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Courtyard in the center of the ground floor providing natural light, ventilation and a communal space for the household, aligning with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Positioned towards the north-east to enhance positive energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Second bedroom ensuring privacy, includes natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for extra family members or guests.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Smaller guest room with direct access to the courtyard area for natural lighting.

rooms.name: Wardrobe/Storage
rooms.description: Dedicated storage space integrated into the design.

openings.description: North-facing entrance for optimal Vastu flow.
Large window to allow morning sunlight in the living and kitchen areas.
Provides access to courtyard from Bedroom 2, enhancing cross-ventilation.
